actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to confer jurisdiction on the United States Court of Claims with respect to claims presented in the action entitled "Salmon C. Harvey and James V. Aquavella against the United States of America".

summary.text: Confers jurisdiction on the Court of Claims with respect to the claim of two named individuals against the United States.

titles.title: A bill to confer jurisdiction on the United States Court of Claims with respect to claims presented in the action entitled "Salmon C. Harvey and James V. Aquavella against the United States of America".
